column4: Greets, is this the proper channel to find help using Ubuntu?
Thats why its called #ubuntu
Recognised or mounted?
Do you know what device the fat32 partition is?
What do you mean by 'what device'?
like /dev/sba1 or whatecer
I mean, it is basically an external hard drive that I've divided into two partitions.
Yep, but the partitions are recognised differently
Can you easily plug in / unplug the drive? i've never used a external hdd before.
I partitioned it using Partition Magic 8, and this is the first time I've plugged it into a Linux box, so I don't think it has a Linux file structure built in yet.
It won't have.
And it doesn't need it ;-)
I can easily unplug it if I go to the desktop, click on the icon for the partition it does recoginize, and select "Unmount Volume"
I meant physically unplug it.
Mounting / Unmounting is something different
Just noticed the private chat room...  will jump onto that.
Are you receiving my messages in the private room?
No
Are you using XChat?
Eh, I'll stick to this then.
Ubotu is a bot ;D
Eh, one sec, ompaul just messaged me about obotu or something...  I may have to quickly register.
Yeah, @ is used on some IRC clients to signify "operator" status, but that doesn't apply here really.
Try /msg nickserv register PASSWORD
